mapper.insert: insert into polemic_group (id, `name`, `status`, group_num, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, `name`, `status`, group_num, create_time from polemic_group
